concept-wr.title: Inventory Detail
concept-wr.shortdesc: From the Inventory Detail page you can see detailed information about a host, and use it to define hardware profiles that can be used across the cluster.

conbody.p: You access the Inventory Detail page by clicking the host name on the Hosts tab of the Systems Inventory page, as described in . The inventory detail for a host consists of multiple tabs, each addressing a different aspect of the host. They include:
